name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Event Review

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 7, a cram school in Feidong, Anhui Province caught fire, and primary school students at the scene pulled the air conditioning pipe to escape.
The official report said that the accident caused 1 death and 11 injuries

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Enter with caution]
April 8, Xinzhong Road, Ju County, Rizhao, Shandong
A Didi driver had a conflict with a woman riding an electric bike, hit her and then stabbed her in the neck and head multiple times

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 8, at the gate of Lingnan Vocational and Technical College

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of April 8, the owners of Sunac Center in the West Coast New District of Qingdao City, Shandong Province, had a rights protection incident. A large number of owners went to the Housing and Construction Bureau of the West Coast New District and the East District Government, and physical contact occurred between the owners and the police. This rights protection involved two communities, which were originally scheduled to be delivered in July 23 and December 23. Now it has been substantially delayed and unfinished, and there is no notice of delayed delivery. There are very few people on the construction site every day to resume work. The promise of delivery in June 24 has now become empty talk. Government officials only deal with rights protection personnel, not problems. The owner's live broadcast was strangled and the owner was taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Enter with caution]
On April 8, a bus near Dieshan Road in Nanchang, Jiangxi Province suddenly lost control and rushed towards the crowd on the roadside. The scene was horrible with limbs flying everywhere.
The police reported: 3 deaths and 7 injuries, the driver suddenly suffered a heart attack and lost consciousness.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 7, Henan. A 13-year-old girl with leukemia asked a blogger to help her shoot a video, asking her mother to give up her treatment. "Mom, please don't treat me, leave the money to my younger brothers and sisters, I don't deserve it"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Knives in Huizhou Walmart are also locked

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 7, in Shaoyang, Hunan, a man in the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China claimed that he forgot his password when withdrawing money. He brought his ID card, household registration booklet, and military discharge certificate, but the bank still asked him to get a certificate from the community to prove that he was himself.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Public Security Bureau of the Third Division of the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps released a video saying that downloading Twitter, the international version of TikTok, browsing overseas websites to read news, etc., are all acts of circumventing the firewall to access the Internet.
Netizens left comments in the comment section to mock this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of April 7, in Tongxiang, Zhejiang, the developer forced the delivery of the sixth phase of Greenland Yunqi Green Court due to delayed delivery without compensation according to the contract, and the quality of the houses was poor.
That night, the owners gathered at the Tongxiang Construction Bureau to defend their rights. A large number of police and security guards were dispatched to the scene to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 7, a mercenary from China posted a video saying, "The Russians don't treat us as human beings. They asked us to grab trenches, but didn't send any reinforcements after we grabbed them. In the end, only six or seven of the dozens of people were left intact." "Go ahead, don't come over."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 7, it was reported online that at a foot massage parlor in Majie, Wenzhou, Zhejiang, a man stabbed a female employee after a dispute with her. He then took to the street and hacked at anyone he saw. He was finally subdued by the police using weapons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 8, Panjin, Liaoning. Xinle Rice Industry has not paid farmers the money they paid for grain sales, and the police have not filed a case.
On that day, farmers came to the company to defend their rights, but were blocked outside by the police and were not allowed to enter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 8, in Shijiazhuang, Hebei, the government of Qima Town forcibly demolished a school, forcibly expelled the students from the school, and beat them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 8, Shandong Jiaotong University responded to a reporter's interview and said that this incident did happen and the police were investigating. The suspect had been arrested and psychological counseling would be provided to the students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 7, Wuhan, Hubei. An owner of the Power Construction Longyue Chang'an property, dissatisfied with the price cut, smashed the sales office.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 7, the media reported that a Chongqing netizen replied to a video about recruitment in an industrial park in Yongchuan District with the words "Yongchuan people's own KK park" and was subsequently given an administrative penalty by local police.
